2d5ae478-87c7-45fa-acf9-f04aa4724421.title: Counter-Strike 2
2d5ae478-87c7-45fa-acf9-f04aa4724421.summary: For over two decades, Counter-Strike has offered an elite competitive experience, one shaped by millions of players from across the globe. And now the next chapter in the CS story is about to begin. This is Counter-Strike 2.

6012c542-38e1-4660-ba40-1b109c40cb2f.title: Football Manager 2024
6012c542-38e1-4660-ba40-1b109c40cb2f.summary: Build a world-class team ready to dominate your rivals in football’s most prestigious competitions. Progress never stops when you’re pursuing footballing greatness.

d749a819-1e41-4c65-9ce2-7b429c4ebd0d.title: MineCraft
d749a819-1e41-4c65-9ce2-7b429c4ebd0d.summary: Fight your way through an exciting action-adventure game, inspired by classic dungeon crawlers and set in the Minecraft universe!

cdb618ac-248d-4ce1-8ed0-57de1fff6b83.title: Mount & Blade: Warband
cdb618ac-248d-4ce1-8ed0-57de1fff6b83.summary: In a land torn asunder by incessant warfare, it is time to assemble your own band of hardened warriors and enter the fray. Lead your men into battle, expand your realm, and claim the ultimate prize: the throne of Calradia!

c4a4c8b8-51d4-47cf-852c-94711a57ca3d.title: Grand Theft Auto V
c4a4c8b8-51d4-47cf-852c-94711a57ca3d.summary: Grand Theft Auto V for PC offers players the option to explore the award-winning world of Los Santos and Blaine County in resolutions of up to 4k and beyond, as well as the chance to experience the game running at 60 frames per second.
